title: Lots of terminals pop up when background items are working

phases.name: Add background tab creation to terminal store
phases.description: Add addTabInBackground() method to terminalStore.ts that creates a tab without setting it as active. Also add a backgroundMode flag to the TerminalTab interface.
phases.verification: TypeScript compiles without errors. The store should have both addTab() (existing, focuses) and addTabInBackground() (new, doesn't focus) methods.

phases.name: Add visual indicator for background tabs
phases.description: Update TerminalTabs.tsx to show a visual indicator (e.g., dimmed styling or badge) for tabs created in background mode that haven't been viewed yet.
phases.verification: Background tabs are visually distinguishable from active tabs. CSS styling differentiates them.

phases.name: Update tab selection to clear background flag
phases.description: When a user clicks on a background tab to view it, clear the backgroundMode flag so it's no longer styled as a background tab.
phases.verification: Clicking a background tab makes it active and clears the background styling.

phases.name: Build and verify
phases.description: Run typecheck and build to ensure no compilation errors.
phases.verification: pnpm typecheck and pnpm build complete without errors.
